name: Drei Fragezeichen: Das Geheimnis der Geisterinsel
overview: The three question marks experience a makeover with the new Disney film. The heroes of our youth are ready for the next generation. The official game of the film The Three ??? - The Mystery of the Ghost Island takes place in the original locations, and delivers more than just the story of the film. The storylines of the film are cleverly deepened and more adventures and puzzles are added. The NDS - the platform for young and old - is the ideal basis for solving puzzles, solving puzzles and laughing with the three detectives! FEATURES: - The official game of the Disney movie - Slip into the roles of Jupiter, Peter and Bob - The complete adventure of the movie in the original locations - Combine the different skills of the three detectives - Challenging puzzles, clever puzzles and exciting action. Once there, there is suddenly no more time for sunbathing or snorkeling: a mysterious monster, the so-called Tokolosh, is up to mischief and causes fear and terror. Clear thing: a case for THE THREE ???. However, the daring amateur detectives still have no idea that they will stumble upon a secret that goes back to the 17th century and that this case has more to do with their own lives than they would like. And already stuck THE THREE ??? immersed in an exciting adventure beyond anything you've experienced before... Features: The complete cinematic adventure on the DS The original heroes of the film Jupiter, Peter and Bob Challenging puzzles and exciting action Different skills of the three detectives
